attributes.action: Request that Richard mansell QC is removed from his post as a judge.
attributes.background: Richard mansell QC spared a man who abused his wife , a prison sentence, this is an insult to victims of domestic violence and could stop similar victims coming forward due to the judges lenient attitude. I believe he should be relieved of his position with immediate effect.

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions about appointments. 

In any case, sentences are the responsibility of the courts, which are independent of the Government and Parliament.

Anyone can ask the Attorney General to review a sentence they think is too low, and only one person needs to ask for a sentence to be reviewed. You can find out how to do that here:

https://www.gov.uk/complain-about-low-crown-court-sentence
